TopicTitle: Add/Remove Crew at launch (Not Crew Manifest)

Articles.Content:
I know this exists within the mod crew manifest but i am asking is just a plugin that only has the this one feature of being able to add and remove crew from a ship at launch...

purpose of this plugin: so that i don't have to keep reverting to VAB whenever i forget to put a certain kerbal in a certain place or Jeb got in my rocket and since i am running 64-bit, i need as much space as i can get before the bugs move in for the kill...

so just that single feature is needed, i only ask this no since i have already seen several mods that have popped every now and then that are passed off as crew manifest alternatives as they have only single unctions like making only custom kerbals or just crew transfer but not this though...

just a request

I know RealRoster automatically keeps the main three orange suits off your rocket choosing white suits to take their place, automatically hiring new crew if needed. You can set it to choose randomly, the oldest or leave the pods empty so you can choose for yourself.
